Text: The Cruel Sea (1953 film):  The film, which was made by Ealing Studios seven years after the end of the Second World War, was directed by Charles Frend and produced by Leslie Norman.

Triplets:<The Cruel Sea
2:
--------------------
Text: The Cruel Sea (1953 film):  It is based on the best selling novel of the same name by former naval officer Nicholas Monsarrat, though the screenplay by Eric Ambler omits some of Monsarrat's grimmest moments.
